message: Hi Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to let it go for $110. Is this something you'd like to accept?
Hey Alice, $110 is a bit more than I was hoping for.  How about $105? I'm really keen on getting this product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $108. Is that something you'd be interested in?
